title: Remove dependencies on specific field names or prefixes for field names (i.e. tierPrefix)
description: Currently, the spatial contrib makes a lot of assumptions about what field names are when these are simply not needed.  By doing so, it prevents re-use in other applications that have setup their fields differently.

comments.content: Closing because the old spatial contrib module referenced here no longer exists as of Solr 4.
comments.author: David Smiley
